CmdLine: cd ~ &&     wget https://github.com/google/protobuf/releases/download/v3.2.0/protobuf-python-3.2.0.tar.gz &&     tar xvzf protobuf-python-3.2.0.tar.gz &&     cd protobuf-3.2.0/ &&     ./configure &&     make &&     make install &&     cd python &&     python3 setup.py install
